name: UpdateCaseCustomAttribute
description:
Update a custom attribute for a specific case in Datadog.

Use this tool to update the custom attribute of a specific case by providing the case ID and the custom attribute key in Datadog. It should be called when you need to modify the properties of an existing case.

parameters.name: case_identifier
parameters.description: The UUID or key of the case to be updated. This identifies the specific case in Datadog.

parameters.name: custom_attribute_key
parameters.description: The key for the custom attribute of the case to be updated. Provide the exact key name to ensure accurate updates.

parameters.name: update_case_custom_attribute_payload
parameters.description: JSON payload specifying the custom attribute update for a case, including attributes like type, is_multi, and value.

is_multi.description: If true, value must be an array

value.description: Union of supported value for a custom attribute

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

is_multi.description: If true, value must be an array

value.description: Union of supported value for a custom attribute
